医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
虚拟现实如何改变女性的劳动经历PLOS ONE 的一项研究发现，虚拟现实 (VR) 可以有效减轻分娩疼痛和焦虑，为女性提供积极、身临其境的分娩体验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/How-virtual-reality-transforms-womene28099s-labor-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/How-virtual-reality-transforms-womene28099s-labor-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08493e4d-bdb1-4c60-a120-487615412ad2 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 00:12:00 -0400 How virtual reality transforms women’s labor experiences
我们是否使用更多的糖替代品？废水分析揭示了瑞典城市的趋势国际环境组织的一项研究利用废水分析来追踪 COVID-19 大流行期间瑞典五个社区的人造甜味剂使用情况，发现消费水平没有重大健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Are-we-using-more-sugar-substitutes-Wastewater-analysis-reveals-trends-in-Swedish-cities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Are-we-using-more-sugar-substitutes-Wastewater-analysis-reveals-trends-in-Swedish-cities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a939fa44-243e-4fb3-8d36-e1b7c7a22939 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 00:01:00 -0400 Are we using more sugar substitutes? Wastewater analysis reveals trends in Swedish cities
全球 Omega-3 指数图更新揭示了持续存在的数据缺口和低水平《脂质研究进展》中的一项研究更新了全球 Omega-3 指数图，揭示了一些地区的改善，但强调了许多国家的显着数据差距和低水平，强调了全球干预的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Global-Omega-3-Index-map-update-reveals-persistent-data-gaps-and-low-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Global-Omega-3-Index-map-update-reveals-persistent-data-gaps-and-low-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=816df4bc-8003-4fcd-aba3-901de75f1444 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Global Omega-3 Index map update reveals persistent data gaps and low levels
肠道微生物组中的硫代谢物与神经退行性疾病之间的新联系被揭示神经退行性疾病 (NDD) 尚无已知的治疗方法且病因难以捉摸，会对大脑和神经系统造成不可逆转的损害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/New-link- Between-sulfur-metabolites-in-gut-microbiome-and-neurodogenic-diseases-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/New-link- Between-sulfur-metabolites-in-gut-microbiome-and-neurodogenic-diseases-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d182a09b-7b1c-4a86-a001-a96fa000c1b2 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 23:23:24 -0400 New link between sulfur metabolites in gut microbiome and neurodegenerative diseases revealed
昆士兰大学启动管理工作与生活平衡和工作压力恢复的研究昆士兰大学的研究人员需要参与者进行一项研究，以帮助了解人们如何平衡工作与生活并从日常工作压力中恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/UQ-launches-study-on-managing-work-life-balance-and-work-stress-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/UQ-launches-study-on-managing-work-life-balance-and-work-stress-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edcb9723-ae9f-41df-8503-a36ef3146adc Sun, 16 Jun 2024 23:18:00 -0400 UQ launches study on managing work-life balance and work stress recovery
研究揭示富含蛋白质的饮食对肠道微生物组和整体健康的影响新研究揭示了富含蛋白质的饮食对肠道微生物组和整体健康的影响。尽管西方饮食中蛋白质的摄入量不断增加，特别是运动员和肥胖者，但未消化的蛋白质的命运及其对人类健康的影响仍然很大程度上未知。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Study-reveals-the-effects-of- Protein-rich-diets-on-the-gut-microbiome-and-overall-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Study-reveals-the-effects-of- Protein-rich-diets-on-the-gut-microbiome-and-overall-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbe6c82c-d132-44d9-86c0-7830632df03e Sun, 16 Jun 2024 23:17:23 -0400 Study reveals the effects of protein-rich diets on the gut microbiome and overall health
研究揭示了禁食引起的酮症的个体差异及其健康益处研究表明，长期禁食引起的酮症因人而异，并受到年龄、性别和体力活动等因素的影响。它还可以指导个性化的禁食策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Study-reveals-individual-differences-in-fasting-induced-ketosis-and-its-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Study-reveals-individual-differences-in-fasting-induced-ketosis-and-its-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1b7ca5b-e875-4824-a960-f7d5ccb62f92 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 23:03:00 -0400 Study reveals individual differences in fasting-induced ketosis and its health benefits
了解唾液腺微环境以推进干燥病的治疗TLS 是淋巴细胞的聚集体，它们与次级淋巴器官具有相似的细胞区室、组织和功能。重要的是，这些结构在发炎的唾液腺中的存在与活动性疾病、自身抗体产生增加和恶性肿瘤风险相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Understanding-salivary-gland-microenvironment-to-advance-Sjogrens-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Understanding-salivary-gland-microenvironment-to-advance-Sjogrens-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc11f510-514c-480c-b20a-a27c72ca268d Sun, 16 Jun 2024 22:36:00 -0400 Understanding salivary gland microenvironment to advance Sjögren's disease treatment
超过 100 万项比赛记录显示东非人是 50 公里超级马拉松跑得最快的人《科学报告》中的一项研究分析了 50 公里超级马拉松精英运动员的年龄和国家，结果显示，跑得最快的运动员来自非洲国家，其最佳表现年龄在 20 至 24 岁之间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Over-1-million-race-records-show-East-Africans-as-fastest-in-50-km-ultra-marathons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Over-1-million-race-records-show-East-Africans-as-fastest-in-50-km-ultra-marathons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9cf0c7b-15d2-4f2b-a8e4-a43766c9ac23 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 22:33:00 -0400 Over 1 million race records show East Africans as fastest in 50-km ultra-marathons
植物性饮食和生活方式干预对 RA 患者的长期益处为期 16 周的“植物促进关节”试验调查了与常规护理相比，多学科生活方式干预对 RA 患者的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Long-term-benefits-of-plant-based-diet-and-lifestyle-intervention-in-RA-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Long-term-benefits-of-plant-based-diet-and-lifestyle-intervention-in-RA-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2094db9e-c97c-49c5-aa47-820b1f901033 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 22:23:00 -0400 Long-term benefits of plant-based diet and lifestyle intervention in RA patients
